summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4483 for the improvement of 13th Avenue Northwest from West 75th Street to West 83rd Street, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52749 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
